name: Mass Spring Particle Systems
details: For my final year university project I researched, designed and developed an application to demonstrate mass spring particle systems. It is written in C++ and uses OpenGL for rendering.

The application demonstrates cloth and includes natural forces such as gravity and wind, which can be enabled and disabled as required. A simple collision detection function is also included. Further information about all three stages in this project are available on request.
The video below shows a demonstration of the final application.
